channel.title: Wait()?
channel.description:
Is there a code to tell the code to delay like in Pascal? I need it so all the script doesnt run together; I want parts to run in sequence.
Thx

item.title: Wait()?
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Sorry, but whats this about threads? Iv never heard of a java threadâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: Wait()?
item.dc:creator: @turbo_power0 turbo power0
item.description:
@turbo_power0 wrote:

you would need to organize your server into threads for that to be possible, which takes quite a bit of planning. Also there is a method in the thread class that delays a thread: Thread.sleep();
but of course, as i said, that will only work if you organize your server into threads.

Read full topic
